plot: Jamie, a diabetic 9 year-old tearaway, dodges his family and jumps on a train that is departing for the seaside. At first, his impromptu adventure is exciting, but his fun soon turns sour, in this tragic tale of the danger of naivety.
title: A Day Out
plot_es: Jamie, a diabetic 9 year-old tearaway, dodges his family and jumps on a train that is departing for the seaside. At first, his impromptu adventure is exciting, but his fun soon turns sour, in this tragic tale of the danger of naivety.
